prompt: What are the polyhouses present?
What are the grids present in the Polyhouse?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>

SELECT ?grid WHERE {
  ?polyhouse a :Polyhouse .
  ?polyhouse bot:hasStorey ?storey .
  ?storey bot:hasSpace ?grid .
}

prompt: What are the grids present in the Polyhouse 1?
How many spaces are there in the polyhouse 2?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>

SELECT (COUNT(?space) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  :Polyhouse_P2 bot:hasStorey ?storey .
  ?storey bot:hasSpace ?space .
}

prompt: How many elements are there in polyhouse 1?
Are there cameras in the polyhouse 1?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>
PREFIX mep: <https://pi.pauwel.be/voc/distributionelement#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

SELECT ?camera WHERE {
  :Polyhouse_P1 bot:containsElement ?camera .
  ?camera rdf:type mep:AudioVisualAppliance-CAMERA .
}

prompt: What is the hierarchical structure of polyhouse p2?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>

SELECT ?building ?storey ?space ?element WHERE {
  :Polyhouse_P2 a bot:Building .
  :Polyhouse_P2 bot:hasStorey ?storey .
  ?storey bot:hasSpace ?space .
  ?space bot:containsElement ?element .
}

prompt: Are there any sensors in the polyhouse?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>
PREFIX mep: <https://pi.pauwel.be/voc/distributionelement#>

SELECT ?sensor WHERE {
  ?polyhouse a :Polyhouse .
  ?polyhouse bot:containsElement ?sensor .
  ?sensor a mep:Sensor .
}

prompt: Did the cameras make any observation?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX mep: <https://pi.pauwel.be/voc/distributionelement#>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>

SELECT ?camera ?observation WHERE {
  ?camera a mep:AudioVisualAppliance-CAMERA .
  ?camera sosa:madeObservation ?observation .
}

prompt: What type of observation does the sht25 sensor make?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>

SELECT ?type WHERE {
  ?sensor a :SHT25 .
  ?sensor sosa:madeObservation ?observation .
  ?observation a ?type .
}

prompt: What are all connected to Grid 1?
What are the times different observations were made?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>

SELECT ?time WHERE {
  ?observation a sosa:Observation .
  ?observation sosa:hasResult ?result .
  ?result sosa:resultTime ?time .
}

prompt: What are the observations each sensor made?
Did any camera not make any observation in Polyhouse P1?
What are the implementations and what are its characteristics?
completion:
PREFIX amrita: <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX mls: <http://www.w3.org/ns/mls#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?Implementation ?Characteristic ?Description ?Value WHERE {
  ?Implementation a mls:Implementation .
  ?Implementation mls:hasQuality ?Characteristic .
  OPTIONAL { ?Characteristic dcterms:description ?Description } .
  OPTIONAL { ?Characteristic mls:hasValue ?Value } .
}

prompt: What ML task was performed?
What is the accuracy of the model?
completion:
PREFIX amrita: <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX mls: <http://www.w3.org/ns/mls#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX ns3: <http://purl.oclc.org/net/unis/ontology/sensordata.owl/>
 
SELECT ?accuracy WHERE {
  amrita:predictiveAccuracy mls:hasValue ?accuracy .
}

prompt: What are the hyperparameter configurations ?
How many polyhouses are there?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>
SELECT (COUNT(?polyhouse) AS ?count)
WHERE { ?polyhouse a :Polyhouse . }

prompt: What are the polyhouse names?
How many sensors are there in polyhouse 1?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>


SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?sensor) as ?count)
WHERE {
  :Polyhouse_P1 bot:containsElement ?x .
  ?x rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* sosa:Sensor .
  BIND(?x AS ?sensor)
}

prompt: How many sensors are there in polyhouse 2?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX sosa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/>


SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?sensor) as ?count)
WHERE {
  :Polyhouse_P2 bot:containsElement ?x .
  ?x rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* sosa:Sensor .
  BIND(?x AS ?sensor)
}

prompt: Does polyhouse 1 have temperature sensors?
completion:
PREFIX : <http://amrita.sony.org/terms#>
PREFIX bot: <https://w3id.org/bot#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

SELECT ?sensor WHERE {
  :Polyhouse_P1 bot:containsElement ?sensor .
  ?sensor rdf:type mep:Sensor-TEMPERATURESENSOR .
}
